caption: the staff was very welcoming and sociable.
Fantastic food! They catered a Chamber of Commerce event I went to last night and you couldn't get me away from the food section. The catering staff were also all very friendly and courteous.

We used Taste Catering this weekend for my daughters graduation party they were amazing! From the first email to the end of the party everything was handled wonderfully! The menu is extensive and they are willing to customize fully! It was so easy! The day of was executed beautifully and the food was exceptional.  The set up was so pretty and they made it so easy for me. My guests raved about the food! Best chicken and waffles we have ever had! The staff was so sweet and kind and helped out above and beyond what they were there for. I would recommend them for any event big or small! I will definitely use them again in the future! Thank you Chris and to all the wonderful for staff for making our day so special!!! It was a joy to work with all of you!!!
